manpage.title: toupper towupper

description.para: The toupper function converts a lowercase letter to the corresponding uppercase letter. For single C character locale the value of the argument is represented as an unsigned characted or the value of EOF.

return.para: If the argument is a lowercase letter, the toupper function returns the corresponding uppercase letter if there is one; otherwise the argument is returned unchanged.

remarks.para: If possible and appropriate, each of these routines convert a given lowercase letter to an uppercase letter.
